title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7842.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7842.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted
and records produced during all hours regularly open for business. These hours
are 8:30 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. or at alternate hours at the board's
discretion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7842.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
